title: The Dark Stuff: Selected Writings on Rock Music, 1972-1993
description: Paperback. 448 English Faber and Faber In The Dark Stuff Nick Kent profiles twenty-two of the most gifted and self-destructive talents in rock history From Brian Wilson to Syd Barrett. the Rolling Stones to Neil Young.. Iggy Pop to Lou Reed. he offers intimate portraits that are unimaginable in the world of todays market driven music business.
author: Nick Kent
